summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 6th Avenue Northeast and 7th Avenue Northeast, each from the north line of East 45th Street to the south line of East 50th Street; and East 47th Street, from 6th Avenue Northeast to 7th Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle by laying water mains and sewers therein, together with all necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 33136 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
